item.title: Side of the road needs sweeping, 21st January

The whole of the edges on springbank way needs road sweeping there’s debris and stones

item.title: Road subsiding, picture taken with water to show severity of problem. Cars grounding in centre., 21st January
item.description:
Generally to 4 Kingsley Gardens , although problems extends over the whole road. Subsidence to the drain doesn’t help as keeps blocking up. This also needs attention

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Kingsley Gardens, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian crossing never showing green man, light round button illuminates but crossing doesn't allow pedestrians across (I saw 3 full rotations of traffic before I gave up waiting), 21st January
item.description:
The pedestrian crossing on Old Bath Rd, at the junction with London Rd and Hales Rd. Traffic light numbered 6.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Old Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
